{{Infobox Berry |name = #54 Micle |image = [[File:Micle.png]] |caption = This Berry has a very dry flavor. It has the effect of making other food eaten at the same time taste sweet. |growtime = 8h 48m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 2,600 |flavor =
*0 spicy *40 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Micle''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of dry on the field. The [[Pamtre]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 6 mins || 2 hours 12 mins || 4 hours 24 mins || 8 hours 48 mins - 17 hours 36 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MicleTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MicleTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MicleTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Micle berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Pamtre.png|30px]]
